home.heroTitle:
Discover the Real Japan 
 with CampBase
home.heroSubtitle: Your journey begins here. Experience freedom, nature, and comfort.
home.whyChooseSubtitle: We provide the best campervan experience for your Japan trip.

safe.title: Safe & Reliable
safe.desc: All vehicles are fully insured and regularly maintained for your safety and peace of mind.

comfort.title: Comfortable Stay
comfort.desc: Equipped with high-quality bedding and amenities to ensure a comfortable sleep anywhere.

freedom.title: Freedom to Explore
freedom.desc: Go where you want, when you want. Discover hidden gems off the beaten path.
